   21: -module(match_spec_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   24: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   25: -export([test_1/1, test_2/1, test_3/1, test_4a/1, test_4b/1, test_5a/1,
   26:          test_5b/1, caller_and_return_to/1, bad_match_spec_bin/1,
   27: 	 trace_control_word/1, silent/1, silent_no_ms/1, silent_test/1,
   28: 	 ms_trace2/1, ms_trace3/1, ms_trace_dead/1, boxed_and_small/1,
   29: 	 destructive_in_test_bif/1, guard_exceptions/1,
   30: 	 empty_list/1,
   31: 	 unary_plus/1, unary_minus/1, moving_labels/1]).
   32: -export([fpe/1]).
   33: -export([otp_9422/1]).
   34: -export([faulty_seq_trace/1, do_faulty_seq_trace/0]).
   35: -export([maps/1]).
   36: -export([runner/2, loop_runner/3]).
   37: -export([f1/1, f2/2, f3/2, fn/1, fn/2, fn/3]).
   38: -export([do_boxed_and_small/0]).
   39: -export([f1_test4/1, f2_test4/2, f3_test4/2]).
   40: 
   41: % This test suite assumes that tracing in general works. What we test is
   42: % the match spec functionality.
   43: 
   44: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   45: 
   46: suite() ->
   47:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   48:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   49: 
   50: all() ->
   51:     [test_1, test_2, test_3, test_4a, test_4b, test_5a, test_5b, caller_and_return_to, bad_match_spec_bin,
   52:      trace_control_word, silent, silent_no_ms, silent_test, ms_trace2,
   53:      ms_trace3, ms_trace_dead, boxed_and_small, destructive_in_test_bif,
   54:      guard_exceptions, unary_plus, unary_minus, fpe,
   55:      moving_labels,
   56:      faulty_seq_trace,
   57:      empty_list,
   58:      otp_9422,
   59:      maps].
   60: 
   61: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   62:     Config.
   63: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   64:     erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config).
   65: 
   66: test_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   67:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1(a) end,
   68:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
   69:        [],
   70:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [a]}}]),
   71: 
   72:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
   73:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
   74:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[]}],
   75:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}}]),
   76: 
   77:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
   78:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
   79:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{message, false}]}],
   80:        []),
   81: 
   82:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
   83:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
   84:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{message, 4711}]}],
   85:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}, 4711}]),
   86: 
   87:     Ref = make_ref(),
   88:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(Ref, Ref) end,
   89:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
   90:        [{[Ref,'$1'],[{is_reference, '$1'}],[{message, 4711}]}],
   91:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [Ref, Ref]}, 4711}]),
   92:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(Ref, Ref) end,
   93:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
   94:        [{['$1',Ref],[{is_reference, '$1'}],[{message, 4711}]}],
   95:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [Ref, Ref]}, 4711}]),
   96: 
   97:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
   98:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
   99:        [{['$0','$0'],[{is_atom, '$0'}],[{message, 4711}]}],
  100:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}, 4711}]),
  101: 
  102:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, b) end,
  103:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  104:        [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  105:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, b]}}]),
  106: 
  107:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, b) end,
  108:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  109:        [{['_','_'],[],[{message, '$_'}]}],
  110:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, b]}, [a, b]}]),
  111: 
  112:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, '$_') end,
  113:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  114:        [{['$1','$_'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[]}],
  115:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, '$_']}}]),
  116: 
  117:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1({a}) end,
  118:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  119:        [{['$1'],[{'==', '$1', {const, {a}}}],[]}],
  120:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [{a}]}}]),
  121: 
  122:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1({a}) end,
  123:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  124:        [{['$1'],[{'==', '$1', {{a}}}],[]}],
  125:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [{a}]}}]),
  126: 
  127:     %% Undocumented, currently.
  128:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  129:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  130:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{message, 4711},
  131:                                         {message, true}]}],
  132:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}}]),
  133: 
  134:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  135:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  136:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{message, 4711},
  137:                                         {message, false}]}],
  138:        []),
  139: 
  140:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  141:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  142:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[kakalorum]}],
  143:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}}]),
  144: 
  145:     %% Verify that 'process_dump' can handle a matchstate on the stack.
  146:     tr(fun() -> fbinmatch(<<0>>, 0) end,
  147:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  148:        [{['_'],[],[{message, {process_dump}}]}],
  149:        [fun({trace, _, call, {?MODULE, f1, [0]}, _Bin}) -> true end]),
  150: 
  151:     % Error cases
  152:     errchk([{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{banka, kanin}]}]),
  153:     ok.
  154: 
  155: test_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  156:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  157:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  158:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{return_trace}]}],
  159:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}},
  160:         {return_from, {?MODULE, f2, 2}, {a, a}}]),
  161:     ok.
  162: 
  163: %% Test the enable_trace/2 and caller/0 PAM instructions
  164: test_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  165:     Fun1 = fun() -> 
  166: 		   register(fnoppelklopfer,self()),
  167: 		   ?MODULE:f2(a, b),
  168: 		   ?MODULE:f2(a, b) 
  169: 	   end,
  170:     P1 = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun1]),
  171:     Pat = [{['$1','$1'],[],[{message,
  172:                              [{enable_trace, P1, call},{caller}]}]},
  173:            {['_','_'],[],[{message,
  174:                            [{disable_trace, fnoppelklopfer, call}]}]}],
  175:     Fun2 = fun() -> ?MODULE:f3(a, a) end,
  176:     P2 = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun2]),
  177:     erlang:trace(P2, true, [call]),
  178:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2, 2}, Pat),
  179:     collect(P2, [{trace, P2, call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}, [true,
  180: 							     {?MODULE,f3,2}]}]),
  181:     collect(P1, [{trace, P1, call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, b]}, [true]}]),
  182:     ok.
  183: 
  184: %% Test `caller_line` trace with `call` and `global`
  185: test_4a(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  186:     Fun = fun() -> ?MODULE:f3_test4(a, b) end,
  187:     Pat = [{'_', [],[{message, {caller_line}}]}],
  188:     P = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun]),
  189:     erlang:trace(P, true, [call]),
  190:     %% `global` is implied but we still mention explicitly
  191:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test4, 2}, Pat, [global]),
  192:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test4, 1}, Pat, [global]),
  193:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test4, [a, b]}, {?MODULE, f3_test4, 2, {"test4.erl", 3}}},
  194:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test4, [a]}, {?MODULE, f3_test4, 2, {"test4.erl", 3}}}]),
  195:     ok.
  196: 
  197: %% Test `caller_line` trace with `return_trace`, `call` and `global`
  198: test_4b(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  199:     Fun = fun() -> ?MODULE:f3_test4(a, b) end,
  200:     P = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun]),
  201:     Pat = [{'_', [], [{return_trace}, {message, {caller_line}}]}],
  202:     erlang:trace(P, true, [call]),
  203:     %% `global` is implied but we still mention explicitly
  204:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test4, 2}, Pat, [global]),
  205:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test4, 1}, Pat, [global]),
  206:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test4, [a, b]}, {?MODULE, f3_test4, 2, {"test4.erl", 3}}},
  207:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test4, [a]}, {?MODULE, f3_test4, 2, {"test4.erl", 3}}},
  208:                 {trace, P, return_from, {?MODULE, f1_test4, 1}, {a}},
  209:                 {trace, P, return_from, {?MODULE, f2_test4, 2}, {a}}
  210:                ]),
  211:     ok.
  212: 
  213: %% Test `caller_line` trace with `call` and `local`
  214: test_5a(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  215:     Fun = fun() -> f3_test5(a, b) end,
  216:     Pat = [{'_', [],[{message, {caller_line}}]}],
  217:     P = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun]),
  218:     erlang:trace(P, true, [call]),
  219:     %% Notice `local` function tracing
  220:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test5, 2}, Pat, [local]),
  221:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test5, 1}, Pat, [local]),
  222:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test5, [a, b]}, {?MODULE, f3_test5, 2, {"test5.erl", 3}}},
  223:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test5, [a]}, {?MODULE, f3_test5, 2, {"test5.erl", 3}}}]),
  224:     ok.
  225: 
  226: %% Test `caller_line` trace with `return_trace`, `call` and `local`
  227: test_5b(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  228:     Fun = fun() -> f3_test5(a, b) end,
  229:     P = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun]),
  230:     Pat = [{'_', [], [{return_trace}, {message, {caller_line}}]}],
  231:     erlang:trace(P, true, [call]),
  232:     %% Notice `local` function tracing
  233:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test5, 2}, Pat, [local]),
  234:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test5, 1}, Pat, [local]),
  235:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test5, [a, b]}, {?MODULE, f3_test5, 2, {"test5.erl", 3}}},
  236:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test5, [a]}, {?MODULE, f3_test5, 2, {"test5.erl", 3}}},
  237:                 {trace, P, return_from, {?MODULE, f1_test5, 1}, {a}},
  238:                 {trace, P, return_from, {?MODULE, f2_test5, 2}, {a}}
  239:                ]),
  240:     ok.
  241: 
  242: %% Test that caller and return to work as they should
  243: %% There was a bug where caller would be undefined when return_to was set
  244: %% for r the bif erlang:put().
  245: caller_and_return_to(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  246:     tr(
  247:       fun do_put_wrapper/0,
  248:       fun (Tracee) ->
  249:               MsgCaller = [{'_',[],[{message,{caller}}]}],
  250:               1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call,return_to]),
  251:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {?MODULE,do_put,1}, MsgCaller, [local]),
  252:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {?MODULE,do_the_put,1}, MsgCaller, [local]),
  253:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, MsgCaller, [local]),
  254:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {erlang,put,2}, MsgCaller, [local]),
  255: 
  256:               [{trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,do_put,[test]},{?MODULE,do_put_wrapper,0}},
  257:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,do_the_put,[test]},{?MODULE,do_put,1}},
  258:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[1]},{?MODULE,do_the_put,1}},
  259:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_the_put,1}},
  260:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,put,[test,"1"]},{?MODULE,do_the_put,1}},
  261:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_the_put,1}},
  262:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_put,1}},
  263: 
  264:                %% These last trace messages are a bit strange...
  265:                %% if call tracing had been enabled for do_put_wrapper
  266:                %% then caller and return_to would have been {?MODULE,do_put_wrapper,1}
  267:                %% but since it is not, they are set to do_put instead, but we still
  268:                %% get the do_put_wrapper return_to message...
  269:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]},{?MODULE,do_put,1}},
  270:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_put,1}},
  271:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_put_wrapper,0}}
  272:               ]
  273:       end),
  274:     ok.
  275: 
  276: do_put_wrapper() ->
  277:     do_put(test),
  278:     ok.
  279: 
  280: do_put(Var) ->
  281:     do_the_put(Var),
  282:     erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)).
  283: do_the_put(Var) ->
  284:     Lst = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  285:     erlang:put(Var, Lst).
  286: 
  287: otp_9422(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  288:     Laps = 10000,
  289:     Fun1 = fun() -> otp_9422_tracee() end,
  290:     P1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, loop_runner, [self(), Fun1, Laps]),
  291:     io:format("spawned ~p as tracee\n", [P1]),
  292: 
  293:     erlang:trace(P1, true, [call, silent]),
  294: 
  295:     Fun2 = fun() -> otp_9422_trace_changer() end,
  296:     P2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, loop_runner, [self(), Fun2, Laps]),
  297:     io:format("spawned ~p as trace_changer\n", [P2]),
  298: 
  299:     start_collect(P1),
  300:     start_collect(P2),
  301: 
  302:     %%receive after 10*1000 -> ok end,
  303: 
  304:     stop_collect(P1),
  305:     stop_collect(P2, abort),
  306:     ok.
  307:     
  308: otp_9422_tracee() ->
  309:     ?MODULE:f1(a),
  310:     ?MODULE:f1(b),
  311:     ?MODULE:f1(c).
  312: 
  313: otp_9422_trace_changer() ->
  314:     Pat1 = [{[a], [], [{enable_trace, arity}]}],
  315:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1, 1}, Pat1),
  316:     Pat2 = [{[b], [], [{disable_trace, arity}]}],
  317:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1, 1}, Pat2).
  318: 
  319:     
  320:     
  321: 
  322: 
  323: bad_match_spec_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  324:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:match_spec_run([1], <<>>)),
  325:     B0 = <<1,2>>,
  326:     {B,_} = split_binary(B0, 0),
  327:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:match_spec_run([1], B)),
  328:     ok.
  329: 
  330: 
  331: 
  332: %% Test the erlang:system_info(trace_control_word) and
  333: %% erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, Value) BIFs,
  334: %% as well as the get_tcw/0 and set_tcw/1 PAM instructions
  335: trace_control_word(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  336:     32 = Bits = tcw_bits(),
  337:     High = 1 bsl (Bits - 1),
  338:     erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, 17),
  339:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1(a) end,
  340:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  341:        [{'_',[{'=:=', {get_tcw}, 17}],[]}],
  342:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [a]}}]),
  343:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1(a) end,
  344:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  345:        [{'_',[{'=:=', {get_tcw}, 18}],[]}],
  346:        []),
  347:     erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, High),
  348:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1(a) end,
  349:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  350:        [{'_',[{'=:=', {get_tcw}, High}],[]}],
  351:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [a]}}]),
  352:     erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, 0),
  353:     tr(fun() -> 
  354:                ?MODULE:f1(a), 
  355:                ?MODULE:f1(start), 
  356:                ?MODULE:f1(b), 
  357:                ?MODULE:f1(c), 
  358:                ?MODULE:f1(high), 
  359:                ?MODULE:f1(d),
  360:                ?MODULE:f1(stop), 
  361:                ?MODULE:f1(e) 
  362:        end,
  363:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  364:        [{[start],
  365:          [],
  366:          [{message, {set_tcw, 17}}]},
  367:         {[stop],
  368:          [],
  369:          [{message, {set_tcw, 0}}]},
  370:         {[high],
  371:          [],
  372:          [{message, {set_tcw, High}}]},
  373:         {['_'],
  374:          [{'>', {get_tcw}, 0}],
  375:          [{set_tcw, {'+', 1, {get_tcw}}}, {message, {get_tcw}}] }],
  376:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [start]}, 0},
  377:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [b]}, 18},
  378:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [c]}, 19},
  379:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [high]}, 19},
  380:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [d]}, High + 1},
  381:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [stop]}, High + 1}]),
  382:     0 = erlang:system_info(trace_control_word),
  383:     ok.
  384: 
  385: tcw_bits() ->
  386:     tcw_bits(erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, 0), 0, 0).
  387: 
  388: tcw_bits(Save, Prev, Bits) ->
  389:     Curr = 1 bsl Bits,
  390:     case catch erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, Curr) of
  391:         {'EXIT' , {badarg, _}} ->
  392:             Prev = erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, Save),
  393:             Bits;
  394:         Prev ->
  395:             Curr = erlang:system_info(trace_control_word),
  396:             tcw_bits(Save, Curr, Bits+1)
  397:     end.
  398: 
  399: 
  400: %% Test the erlang:trace(_, _, [silent]) flag
  401: %% as well as the silent/0 PAM instruction
  402: silent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  403:     %% Global call trace
  404:     tr(fun() -> 
  405:                ?MODULE:f1(a),     % No trace - not active
  406:                ?MODULE:f1(miss),  % No trace - no activation
  407:                ?MODULE:f1(b),     % No trace - still not active
  408:                ?MODULE:f1(start), % Trace    - activation
  409:                ?MODULE:f1(c),     % Trace    - active
  410:                f1(d),             % No trace - local call
  411:                ?MODULE:f1(miss),  % Trace    - no inactivation
  412:                ?MODULE:f1(e),     % Trace    - still active
  413:                ?MODULE:f1(stop),  % No trace - inactivation
  414:                ?MODULE:f1(f)      % No trace - not active
  415:        end,
  416:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  417:        [call, silent],
  418:        [{[start],
  419:          [],
  420:          [{silent, false}, {message, start}]},
  421:         {[stop],
  422:          [],
  423:          [{silent, true}, {message, stop}]},
  424:         {[miss],
  425:          [],
  426:          [{silent, neither_true_nor_false}, {message, miss}]},
  427:         {['$1'],
  428:          [],
  429:          [{message, '$1'}] }],
  430:        [global],
  431:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [start]}, start},
  432:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [c]}, c},
  433:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [miss]}, miss},
  434:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [e]}, e} ]),
  435:     %% Local call trace
  436:     tr(fun() -> 
  437:                ?MODULE:f1(a),     % No trace - not active
  438:                f1(b),             % No trace - not active
  439:                ?MODULE:f1(start), % Trace    - activation
  440:                ?MODULE:f1(c),     % Trace    - active
  441:                f1(d),             % Trace    - active
  442:                f1(stop),          % No trace - inactivation
  443:                ?MODULE:f1(e),     % No trace - not active
  444:                f1(f)              % No trace - not active
  445:        end,
  446:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  447:        [call, silent],
  448:        [{[start],
  449:          [],
  450:          [{silent, false}, {message, start}]},
  451:         {[stop],
  452:          [],
  453:          [{silent, true}, {message, stop}]},
  454:         {['$1'],
  455:          [],
  456:          [{message, '$1'}] }],
  457:        [local],
  458:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [start]}, start},
  459:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [c]}, c},
  460:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [d]}, d} ]),
  461:     ok.
  462: 
  463: %% Test the erlang:trace(_, _, [silent]) flag without match specs
  464: silent_no_ms(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  465:     %% Global call trace
  466:     %%
  467:     %% Trace f2/2 and erlang:integer_to_list/1 without match spec
  468:     %% and use match spec on f1/1 to control silent flag.
  469:     tr(
  470:       fun () -> 
  471:               ?MODULE:f1(a),
  472:               ?MODULE:f2(b, c),
  473:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  474:               ?MODULE:f3(d, e),
  475:               ?MODULE:f1(start),
  476:               ?MODULE:f2(f, g),
  477:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)),
  478:               ?MODULE:f3(h, i),
  479:               ?MODULE:f1(stop),
  480:               ?MODULE:f2(j, k),
  481:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(3)),
  482:               ?MODULE:f3(l, m)
  483:       end,
  484:       fun (Tracee) ->
  485:               1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call,silent,return_to]),
  486:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f2,2}, [], [global]),
  487:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, [], [global]),
  488:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern(
  489:                     {?MODULE,f1,1},
  490:                     [{[start],[],[{silent,false}]},
  491:                      {[stop],[],[{silent,true}]}],
  492:                     [global]),
  493:               %%
  494:               %% Expected: (no return_to for global call trace)
  495:               %%
  496:               [{trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f1,[start]}},
  497:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[f,g]}},
  498:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]}},
  499:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[h,i]}}]
  500:       end),
  501:     %% Local call trace
  502:     %%
  503:     %% Trace f2/2 and erlang:integer_to_list/1 without match spec
  504:     %% and use match spec on f1/1 to control silent flag.
  505:     tr(
  506:       fun () -> 
  507:               ?MODULE:f1(a),
  508:               ?MODULE:f2(b, c),
  509:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  510:               ?MODULE:f3(d, e),
  511:               ?MODULE:f1(start),
  512:               ?MODULE:f2(f, g),
  513:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)),
  514:               ?MODULE:f3(h, i),
  515:               ?MODULE:f1(stop),
  516:               ?MODULE:f2(j, k),
  517:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(3)),
  518:               ?MODULE:f3(l, m)
  519:       end,
  520:       fun (Tracee) ->
  521:               1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call,silent,return_to]),
  522:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f2,2}, [], [local]),
  523:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, [], [local]),
  524:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern(
  525:                     {?MODULE,f1,1},
  526:                     [{[start],[],[{silent,false}]},
  527:                      {[stop],[],[{silent,true}]}],
  528:                     [local]),
  529:               %%
  530:               %% Expected:
  531:               %%
  532:               [{trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f1,[start]}},
  533:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,
  534:                 {?MODULE,'-silent_no_ms/1-fun-3-',0}},
  535:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[f,g]}},
  536:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,
  537:                 {?MODULE,'-silent_no_ms/1-fun-3-',0}},
  538:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]}},
  539:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,
  540:                 {?MODULE,'-silent_no_ms/1-fun-3-',0}},
  541:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[h,i]}},
  542:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,f3,2}}]
  543:       end).
  544: 
  545: %% Test that match_spec_test does not activate silent
  546: silent_test(_Config) ->
  547:     {flags,[]} = erlang:trace_info(self(),flags),
  548:     erlang:match_spec_test([],[{'_',[],[{silent,true}]}],trace),
  549:     {flags,[]} = erlang:trace_info(self(),flags).
  550: 
  551: 
  552: %% Test the match spec functions {trace/2}
  553: ms_trace2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  554:     Tracer = self(),
  555:     %% Meta trace init
  556:     %%
  557:     %% Trace global f1/1, local f2/2, global erlang:integer_to_list/1
  558:     %% without match spec. Use match spec functions
  559:     %% {trace/2} to control trace through fn/2,3.
  560:     tr(
  561:       fun () -> 
  562:               ?MODULE:f1(a),
  563:               ?MODULE:f2(b, c),
  564:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  565:               ?MODULE:f3(d, e),
  566:               fn([all], [call,return_to,{tracer,Tracer}]),
  567:               ?MODULE:f1(f),
  568:               f2(g, h),
  569:               f1(i),
  570:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)),
  571:               ?MODULE:f3(j, k),
  572:               fn([call,return_to], []),
  573:               ?MODULE:f1(l),
  574:               ?MODULE:f2(m, n),
  575:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(3)),
  576:               ?MODULE:f3(o, p)
  577:       end,
  578:       fun (Tracee) ->
  579:               1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, false, [all]),
  580:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f1,1}, [], [global]),
  581:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f2,2}, [], [local]),
  582:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, [], [global]),
  583:               3 = erlang:trace_pattern(
  584:                     {?MODULE,fn,'_'},
  585:                     [{['$1','$2'],[],
  586:                       [{trace,'$1','$2'},{message,ms_trace2}]}],
  587:                     [meta]),
  588:               %%
  589:               %% Expected: (no return_to for global call trace)
  590:               %%
  591:               Origin = {match_spec_SUITE,'-ms_trace2/1-fun-1-',1},
  592:               [{trace_ts,Tracee,call,
  593:                 {?MODULE,fn,
  594:                  [[all],[call,return_to,{tracer,Tracer}]]},
  595:                 ms_trace2},
  596:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f1,[f]}},
  597:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[g,h]}},
  598:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,Origin},
  599:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]}},
  600:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[j,k]}},
  601:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,f3,2}},
  602:                {trace_ts,Tracee,call,
  603:                 {?MODULE,fn,
  604:                  [[call,return_to],[]]},
  605:                 ms_trace2}]
  606:       end),
  607:     %% Silence valgrind
  608:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,fn,'_'},[],[]),
  609:     ok.
  610: 
  611: 
  612: 
  613: %% Test the match spec functions {trace/3}
  614: ms_trace3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  615:     TraceeName = 'match_spec_SUITE:ms_trace3',
  616:     Tracer = self(),
  617:     %% Meta trace init
  618:     %%
  619:     %% Trace global f1/1, local f2/2, global erlang:integer_to_list/1
  620:     %% without match spec. Use match spec functions
  621:     %% {trace/2} to control trace through fn/2,3.
  622:     Tag = make_ref(),
  623:     Controller =
  624:     spawn_link(
  625:       fun () ->
  626:               receive 
  627:                   {Tracee,Tag,start} ->
  628:                       fn(TraceeName, [all], 
  629:                          [call,return_to,send,'receive',
  630:                           {tracer,Tracer}]),
  631:                       Tracee ! {self(),Tag,started},
  632:                       receive {Tracee,Tag,stop_1} -> ok end,
  633:                       fn(Tracee, [call,return_to], []),
  634:                       Tracee ! {self(),Tag,stopped_1},
  635:                       receive {Tracee,Tag,stop_2} -> ok end,
  636:                       fn(Tracee, [all], []),
  637:                       Tracee ! {self(),Tag,stopped_2}
  638:               end
  639:       end),
  640:     tr(
  641:       fun () -> %% Action
  642:               register(TraceeName, self()),
  643:               ?MODULE:f1(a),
  644:               ?MODULE:f2(b, c),
  645:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  646:               ?MODULE:f3(d, e),
  647:               Controller ! {self(),Tag,start},
  648:               receive {Controller,Tag,started} -> ok end,
  649:               ?MODULE:f1(f),
  650:               f2(g, h),
  651:               f1(i),
  652:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)),
  653:               ?MODULE:f3(j, k),
  654:               Controller ! {self(),Tag,stop_1},
  655:               receive {Controller,Tag,stopped_1} -> ok end,
  656:               ?MODULE:f1(l),
  657:               ?MODULE:f2(m, n),
  658:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(3)),
  659:               ?MODULE:f3(o, p),
  660:               Controller ! {self(),Tag,stop_2},
  661:               receive {Controller,Tag,stopped_2} -> ok end,
  662:               ?MODULE:f1(q),
  663:               ?MODULE:f2(r, s),
  664:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(4)),
  665:               ?MODULE:f3(t, u)
  666:       end,
  667: 
  668:       fun (Tracee) -> %% Startup
  669:               1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, false, [all]),
  670:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f1,1}, [], [global]),
  671:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f2,2}, [], [local]),
  672:               1 = erlang:trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, [], [global]),
  673:               3 = erlang:trace_pattern(
  674:                     {?MODULE,fn,'_'},
  675:                     [{['$1','$2','$3'],[],
  676:                       [{trace,'$1','$2','$3'},{message,Tag}]}],
  677:                     [meta]),
  678:               %%
  679:               %% Expected: (no return_to for global call trace)
  680:               %%
  681:               Origin = {match_spec_SUITE,'-ms_trace3/1-fun-2-',2},
  682:               [{trace_ts,Controller,call,
  683:                 {?MODULE,fn,[TraceeName,[all],
  684:                              [call,return_to,send,'receive',
  685:                               {tracer,Tracer}]]},
  686:                 Tag},
  687:                {trace,Tracee,'receive',{Controller,Tag,started}},
  688:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f1,[f]}},
  689:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[g,h]}},
  690:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,Origin},
  691:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]}},
  692:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[j,k]}},
  693:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,f3,2}},
  694:                {trace,Tracee,send,{Tracee,Tag,stop_1},Controller},
  695:                {trace_ts,Controller,call,
  696:                 {?MODULE,fn,[Tracee,[call,return_to],[]]},
  697:                 Tag},
  698:                {trace_ts,Controller,call,
  699:                 {?MODULE,fn,[Tracee,[all],[]]},
  700:                 Tag}]
  701:       end),
  702:     ok.
  703: 
  704: %% Test that a dead tracer is removed using ms
  705: ms_trace_dead(_Config) ->
  706:     Self = self(),
  707:     TFun = fun F() -> receive M -> Self ! M, F() end end,
  708:     {Tracer, MRef} = spawn_monitor(TFun),
  709:     MetaTracer = spawn_link(TFun),
  710:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1, '_'},
  711:                          [{'_',[],[{message, false},
  712:                                    {trace,[],
  713:                                     [call,{const,{tracer,Tracer}}]}]}],
  714:                          [{meta, MetaTracer}]),
  715:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2, '_'}, []),
  716:     ?MODULE:f2(1,2),
  717:     ?MODULE:f1(1),
  718:     {tracer,Tracer} = erlang:trace_info(self(), tracer),
  719:     {flags,[call]} = erlang:trace_info(self(), flags),
  720:     ?MODULE:f2(2,3),
  721:     receive {trace, Self, call, {?MODULE, f2, _}} -> ok end,
  722:     exit(Tracer, stop),
  723:     receive {'DOWN',MRef,_,_,_} -> ok end,
  724:     ?MODULE:f1(2),
  725:     {tracer,[]} = erlang:trace_info(self(), tracer),
  726:     ?MODULE:f2(3,4),
  727:     TRef = erlang:trace_delivered(all),
  728:     receive {trace_delivered, _, TRef} -> ok end,
  729:     receive M -> ct:fail({unexpected, M}) after 10 -> ok end.
  730: 
  731: %% Test that destructive operations in test bif does not really happen
  732: destructive_in_test_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  733:     {ok,OldToken,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  734: 				([],
  735: 				 [{'_',[],[{message,{get_seq_token}}]}],trace),
  736:     {ok,_,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  737: 			 ([],
  738: 			  [{'_',[],[{message,{set_seq_token, label, 1}}]}],
  739: 			  trace),
  740:     {ok,OldToken,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  741: 				([],
  742: 				 [{'_',[],[{message,{get_seq_token}}]}],trace),
  743:     {ok, OldTCW,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  744: 			       ([],[{'_',[],[{message,{get_tcw}}]}],trace),
  745:     {ok,OldTCW,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  746: 			      ([],
  747: 			       [{'_',[],[{message,{set_tcw, OldTCW+1}}]}],
  748: 			       trace),
  749:     {ok, OldTCW,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  750: 			       ([],[{'_',[],[{message,{get_tcw}}]}],trace),
  751:     ok.
  752: 
  753: %% Test that the comparison between boxed and small does not crash emulator
  754: boxed_and_small(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  755:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  756:     ok = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,do_boxed_and_small,[]),
  757:     peer:stop(Peer).
  758: 
  759: do_boxed_and_small() ->
  760:     {ok, false, _, _} = erlang:match_spec_test({0,3},[{{1.47,'_'},[],['$_']}],table),
  761:     {ok, false, _, _} = erlang:match_spec_test({0,3},[{{12345678901234567890,'_'},[],['$_']}],table),
  762:     {ok, false, _, _} = erlang:match_spec_test({0,3},[{{<<1,2,3,4>>,'_'},[],['$_']}],table),
  763:     {ok, false, _, _} = erlang:match_spec_test({0,3},[{{make_ref(),'_'},[],['$_']}],table),
  764:     ok.
  765: 
  766: %% Test that faulty seq_trace_call does not crash emulator
  767: faulty_seq_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  768:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  769:     ok = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,do_faulty_seq_trace,[]),
  770:     peer:stop(Peer).
  771: 
  772: do_faulty_seq_trace() ->
  773:     {ok,'EXIT',_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test([],[{'_',[],[{message,{set_seq_token,yxa,true}}]}],trace),
  774:     ok.
  775: 
  776: errchk(Pat) ->
  777:     case catch erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2, 2}, Pat) of
  778: 	{'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
  779: 	    ok;
  780: 	Other ->
  781: 	    ct:fail({noerror, Other})
  782:     end.
  783: 
  784: %% Checks that unary minus works
  785: unary_minus(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  786:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  787: 			      (5,
  788: 			       [{'$1',
  789: 				 [{'<',{'-','$1'},-4}],
  790: 				 [true]}],
  791: 			       table),
  792:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  793: 			      (5,
  794: 			       [{'$1',
  795: 				 [{'<',{'-','$1'},-6}],
  796: 				 [true]}],
  797: 			       table),
  798:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  799: 			      (5,
  800: 			       [{'$1',
  801: 				 [{'=:=',{'-','$1',2},3}],
  802: 				 [true]}],
  803: 			       table),
  804:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  805: 			      (hej,
  806: 			       [{'$1',
  807: 				 [{'=/=',{'-','$1'},0}],
  808: 				 [true]}],
  809: 			       table),

  843: %% Checks that exceptions in guards are handled correctly
  844: guard_exceptions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  845:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  846: 			       (5,
  847: 				[{'$1',
  848: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},{'or','$1','$1'}}],
  849: 				  [true]}],
  850: 				table),
  851:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  852: 			       (5,
  853: 				[{'$1',
  854: 				  [{'orelse',{is_integer,'$1'},
  855: 				    {'or','$1','$1'}}],
  856: 				  [true]}],
  857: 				table),
  858:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  859: 			       (5,
  860: 				[{'$1',
  861: 				  [{'orelse',{'or','$1',true},
  862: 				    {is_integer,'$1'}}],
  863: 				  [true]}],
  864: 				table),
  865:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  866: 			       (5,
  867: 				[{'$1',
  868: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
  869: 				    {'orelse','$1',true}}],
  870: 				  [true]}],
  871: 				table),
  872:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  873: 			       (5,
  874: 				[{'$1',
  875: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
  876: 				    {'orelse',true,'$1'}}],
  877: 				  [true]}],
  878: 				table),
  879:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  880: 			       (5,
  881: 				[{'$1',
  882: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
  883: 				    {'andalso',false,'$1'}}],
  884: 				  [true]}],
  885: 				table),
  886:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  887: 			       (5,
  888: 				[{'$1',
  889: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
  890: 				    {'andalso','$1',false}}],
  891: 				  [true]}],
  892: 				table),
  893: 
  894:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  895: 			       (5,
  896: 				[{'$1',
  897: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
  898: 				    {'andalso','$1',false}}],
  899: 				  [true]}],
  900: 				table),
  901: 
  902:     ok.

  904: %% Checks floating point exceptions in match-specs
  905: fpe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  906:     MS = [{{'$1'},[],[{'/','$1',0}]}],
  907:     case catch (['EXIT','EXIT'] = 
  908: 		ets:match_spec_run([{1},{2}],ets:match_spec_compile(MS))) of 
  909: 	{'EXIT',_} -> ct:fail({error, "Floating point exceptions faulty"});
  910: 	_ -> ok 
  911:     end.
  912: 
  913: %% Test maps in match-specs
  914: maps(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  915:     {ok,#{},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{'_',[],['$_']}], table),
  916:     {ok,#{},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{#{},[],['$_']}], table),
  917:     {ok,false,[],[]} =
  918:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{not_a_map,[],['$_']}], table),
  919:     {ok,bar,[],[]} =
  920:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{foo => bar},
  921:                                [{#{foo => '$1'},[],['$1']}],
  922:                                table),
  923:     {ok,false,[],[]} =
  924:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{foo => bar},
  925:                                [{#{foo => qux},[],[qux]}],
  926:                                table),
  927:     {ok,false,[],[]} =
  928:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{#{foo => '_'},[],[foo]}], table),
  929:     {error,_} =
  930:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{#{'$1' => '_'},[],[foo]}], table),
  931:     {ok,bar,[],[]} =
  932:         erlang:match_spec_test({#{foo => bar}},
  933:                                [{{#{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  934:                                table),
  935:     {ok,#{foo := 3},[],[]} =
  936:         erlang:match_spec_test({}, [{{},[],[#{foo => {'+',1,2}}]}], table),
  937: 
  938:     {ok,"camembert",[],[]} =
  939:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{b => "camembert",c => "cabcou"},
  940:                                [{#{b => '$1',c => "cabcou"},[],['$1']}], table),
  941: 
  942:     {ok,#{a :="camembert",b := "hi"},[],[]} =
  943:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{<<"b">> =>"camembert","c"=>"cabcou", "wat"=>"hi", b=><<"other">>},
  944:                                [{#{<<"b">> => '$1',"wat" => '$2'},[],[#{a=>'$1',b=>'$2'}]}],
  945:                                table),
  946: 
  947:     {ok,1,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{map_size,'$1'}]}],table),
  948:     {ok,'EXIT',[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[],[{map_size,'$1'}]}], table),
  949:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[{map_size,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
  950:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[{'=:=',{map_size,'$1'},1}],[true]}], table),
  951: 
  952:     {ok,1,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{map_get,a,'$1'}]}], table),
  953:     {ok,'EXIT',[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{map_get,b,'$1'}]}], table),
  954:     {ok,'EXIT',[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[],[{map_get,b,'$1'}]}], table),
  955:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[{map_get,b,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
  956:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[{map_get,b,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
  957:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => true}, [{'$1',[{map_get,a,'$1'}],[true]}], table),
  958: 
  959:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{is_map_key,a,'$1'}]}], table),
  960:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{is_map_key,b,'$1'}]}], table),
  961:     {ok,'EXIT',[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[],[{is_map_key,a,'$1'}]}], table),
  962:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[{is_map_key,b,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
  963:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[{is_map_key,b,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
  964:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => true}, [{'$1',[{is_map_key,a,'$1'}],[true]}], table),
  965: 
  966:     %% large maps
  967: 
  968:     Ls0 = [{I,<<I:32>>}||I <- lists:seq(1,415)],
  969:     M0  = maps:from_list(Ls0),
  970:     M1  = #{a=>1,b=>2,c=>3,d=>4},
  971: 
  972:     R1  = M0#{263 := #{ a=> 3 }},
  973:     Ms1 = [{M1#{c:='$1'},[],[M0#{263 := #{a => '$1'}}]}],
  974: 
  975:     {ok,R1,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M1,Ms1,table),
  976: 
  977:     Ms2 = [{M0#{63:='$1', 19:='$2'},[],[M0#{19:='$1', 63:='$2'}]}],
  978:     R2  = M0#{63 := maps:get(19,M0), 19 := maps:get(63,M0) },
  979:     {ok,R2,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0,Ms2,table),
  980: 
  981:     ok = maps_check_loop(M1),
  982:     ok = maps_check_loop(M0),
  983:     M2 = maps:from_list([{integer_to_list(K),V} || {K,V} <- Ls0]),
  984:     ok = maps_check_loop(M2),
  985: 
  986:     %% Maps in guards
  987:     {ok,#{a:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',#{a=>1}}],['$1']}], table),
  988:     {ok,#{a:='$1'},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>'$1'}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}],['$1']}], table),
  989:     {ok,#{a:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',#{{const,a}=>1}}],['$1']}], table),
  990:     {ok,#{20:=1,b:=2},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test({11,#{20=>1,b=>2}},[{{'$1','$2'},[{'==','$2',#{{'+','$1',9}=>{'-','$1',10},b=>{const,2}}}],['$2']}], table),
  991:     %% Test that maps with duplicate keys work. This depends on the iteration order of small maps.
  992:     true = lists:any(
  993:              fun(N) ->
  994:                      {ok,#{1=>1,2=>N},[],[]} ==
  995:                          erlang:match_spec_test(#{1=>1,2=>N},[{'$1',[{'==','$1',#{1=>1,2=>2,{const,2}=>3,{'+',1,1}=>4,{'+',2,0}=>5}}],['$1']}],table)
  996:              end,[2,3,4,5]),
  997:     %% Test what happens when a map is collapsed from hash to flatmap
  998:     {ok,#{0:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{0=>1},[{'$1',[{'==','$1',maps:from_list([{{'-',I,I},1} || I <- lists:seq(1,100)])}],['$1']}], table),
  999: 
 1000:     %% Large maps in guards
 1001:     {ok,#{a:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{a=>1}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',M0#{a=>1}}],['$1']}], table),
 1002:     {ok,#{a:='$1'},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{a=>'$1'}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',M0#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}],['$1']}], table),
 1003:     {ok,#{520:=1,b:=2},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test({11,M0#{520=>1,b=>2}},[{{'$1','$2'},[{'==','$2',M0#{{'+','$1',509}=>{'-','$1',10},b=>{const,2}}}],['$2']}], table),
 1004:     %% Test that maps with duplicate keys work. This depends on the iteration order of hash maps.
 1005:     true = lists:any(
 1006:              fun(N) ->
 1007:                      {ok,M0#{1:=1,2:=N},[],[]} == erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{1=>1,2=>N},[{'$1',[{'==','$1',M0#{1=>1,2=>2,{const,2}=>3,{'+',1,1}=>4,{'+',2,0}=>5}}],['$1']}], table)
 1008:              end, [2,3,4,5]),
 1009: 
 1010:     %% Maps in body
 1011:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=2},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[#{a=>'$1',b=>{const,2}}]}], table),
 1012:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=#{a:='$1'}},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[#{a=>'$1',b=>#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}]}], table),
 1013:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=#{a:='$1'}},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[#{a=>'$1',{const,b}=>#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}]}], table),
 1014:     %% Test that maps with duplicate keys work. This depends on the iteration order of small maps.
 1015:     true = lists:any(
 1016:              fun(N) ->
 1017:                      {ok,#{2=>N},[],[]} == erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[#{{'+',3,-1}=>1,2=>2,{const,2}=>3,{'+',1,'$1'}=>4,{'+',2,0}=>5}]}], table)
 1018:              end,[1,2,3,4,5]),
 1019:     %% Test what happens when a map is collapsed from hash to flatmap
 1020:     {ok,#{0:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{0=>1},[{'$1',[],[maps:from_list([{{'-',I,I},1} || I <- lists:seq(1,100)])]}], table),
 1021: 
 1022:     %% Large maps in body
 1023:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=#{a:='$1'}},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[M0#{a=>'$1',b=>M0#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}]}], table),
 1024:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=#{a:='$1'}},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[M0#{a=>'$1',{const,b}=>M0#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}]}], table),
 1025:     %% Test that maps with duplicate keys work. This depends on the iteration order of hash maps.
 1026:     true = lists:any(
 1027:              fun(N) ->
 1028:                      {ok,M0#{1:=1,2:=N},[],[]} == erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{1=>1,2=>5},[{'$1',[],[M0#{1=>1,2=>2,{const,2}=>3,{'+',1,1}=>4,{'*',2,1}=>5}]}], table)
 1029:              end,[2,3,4,5]),
 1030: 
 1031:     ok.
 1032: 
 1033: maps_check_loop(M) ->
 1034:     Ks = maps:keys(M),
 1035:     maps_check_loop(M,M,M,M,Ks,lists:reverse(Ks),1).
 1036: 
 1037: maps_check_loop(Orig,M0,MsM0,Rm0,[K|Ks],[Rk|Rks],Ix) ->
 1038:     MsK  = list_to_atom([$$]++integer_to_list(Ix)),
 1039:     MsM1 = MsM0#{K := MsK},
 1040:     Rm1  = Rm0#{Rk := MsK},
 1041:     M1   = M0#{Rk  := maps:get(K,MsM0)},
 1042:     Ms   = [{MsM1,[],[Rm1]}],
 1043:     {ok,M1,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(Orig,Ms,table),
 1044:     maps_check_loop(Orig,M1,MsM1,Rm1,Ks,Rks,Ix+1);
 1045: maps_check_loop(_,_,_,_,[],[],_) -> ok.
 1046: 
 1047: 
 1048: empty_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1049:     Val=[{'$1',[], [{message,'$1'},{message,{caller}},{return_trace}]}],
 1050:      %% Did crash debug VM in faulty assert:
 1051:     erlang:match_spec_test([],Val,trace).
 1052: 
 1053: moving_labels(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1054:     %% Force an andalso/orelse construction to be moved by placing it
 1055:     %% in a tuple followed by a constant term. Labels should still
 1056:     %% point at their correct target.
 1057:     %% 
 1058:     Ms = [{{'$1','$2'},[],[{{ok,{'andalso','$1','$2'},[1,2,3]}}]}],
 1059:     {ok,{ok,false,[1,2,3]},[],[]} =
 1060: 	erlang:match_spec_test({true,false}, Ms, table),
 1061: 
 1062:     Ms2 = [{{'$1','$2'},[],[{{ok,{'orelse','$1','$2'},[1,2,3]}}]}],
 1063:     {ok,{ok,true,[1,2,3]},[],[]} =
 1064: 	erlang:match_spec_test({true,false}, Ms2, table),
 1065: 
 1066:     ok.
 1067:     
 1068: tr(Fun, MFA, Pat, Expected) ->
 1069:     tr(Fun, MFA, [call], Pat, [global], Expected).
 1070: 
 1071: tr(Fun, MFA, TraceFlags, Pat, PatFlags, Expected0) ->
 1072:     tr(Fun,
 1073:        fun(P) ->
 1074:                erlang:trace(P, true, TraceFlags),
 1075:                erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, Pat, PatFlags),
 1076:                lists:map(
 1077:                  fun(X) when is_function(X,1) -> X;
 1078:                     (X) -> list_to_tuple([trace, P | tuple_to_list(X)])
 1079:                  end,
 1080:                  Expected0)
 1081:        end).
 1082: 
 1083: tr(RunFun, ControlFun) ->
 1084:     P = spawn_link(?MODULE, runner, [self(), RunFun]),
 1085:     collect(P, ControlFun(P)).
 1086: 
 1087: collect(P, TMs) ->
 1088:     start_collect(P),
 1089:     collect(TMs),
 1090:     stop_collect(P).
 1091: 
 1092: collect([]) ->
 1093:     receive
 1094: 	M ->
 1095: 	    io:format("Got unexpected: ~p~n", [M]),
 1096: 	    flush({got_unexpected,M})
 1097:     after 17 ->
 1098: 	    ok
 1099:     end;
 1100: collect([TM | TMs]) ->
 1101:     io:format(        "Expecting:      ~p~n", [TM]),
 1102:     receive
 1103:         %% We only look at trace messages with the same tracee
 1104:         %% as the message we are looking for. This because
 1105:         %% the order of trace messages is only guaranteed from
 1106:         %% within a single process.
 1107: 	M0 when element(2, M0) =:= element(2, TM); is_function(TM, 1) ->
 1108: 	    M = case element(1, M0) of
 1109: 		    trace_ts ->
 1110: 			list_to_tuple(lists:reverse(
 1111: 					tl(lists:reverse(tuple_to_list(M0)))));
 1112: 		    _ -> M0
 1113: 		end,
 1114: 	    case is_function(TM,1) of
 1115: 		true ->
 1116: 		    case (catch TM(M)) of
 1117: 			true ->
 1118: 			    io:format("Got:            ~p~n", [M]),
 1119: 			    collect(TMs);
 1120: 			_ ->
 1121: 			    io:format("Got unexpected: ~p~n", [M]),
 1122: 			    flush({got_unexpected,M})
 1123: 		    end;
 1124: 
 1125: 		false ->
 1126: 		    case M of
 1127: 			TM ->
 1128: 			    io:format("Got:            ~p~n", [M]),
 1129: 			    collect(TMs);
 1130: 			_ ->
 1131: 			    io:format("Got unexpected: ~p~n", [M]),
 1132: 			    flush({got_unexpected,M})
 1133: 		    end
 1134: 	    end
 1135:     after 15000 ->
 1136:             flush(timeout)
 1137:     end.
 1138: 
 1139: flush(Reason) ->
 1140:     receive
 1141:         M ->
 1142:             io:format("In queue:       ~p~n", [M]),
 1143:             flush(Reason)
 1144:     after 17 ->
 1145:               ct:fail(Reason)
 1146:     end.
 1147: 
 1148: start_collect(P) ->
 1149:     P ! {go, self()}.
 1150: 
 1151: stop_collect(P) ->
 1152:     stop_collect(P, done).
 1153: stop_collect(P, Order) ->
 1154:     P ! {Order, self()},
 1155:     receive
 1156:         {gone, P} ->
 1157:             ok
 1158:     end.
 1159: 
 1160: 
 1161: runner(Collector, Fun) ->
 1162:     receive
 1163:         {go, Collector} ->
 1164:             go
 1165:     end,
 1166:     Fun(),
 1167:     receive
 1168:         {done, Collector} ->
 1169:             Collector ! {gone, self()}
 1170:     end.
 1171: 
 1172: loop_runner(Collector, Fun, Laps) ->
 1173:     receive
 1174:         {go, Collector} ->
 1175:             go
 1176:     end,
 1177:     loop_runner_cont(Collector, Fun, 0, Laps).
 1178: 
 1179: loop_runner_cont(Collector, _Fun, Laps, Laps) ->
 1180:     receive
 1181:         {done, Collector} -> ok;
 1182:         {abort, Collector} -> ok
 1183:     end,
 1184:     io:format("loop_runner ~p exit after ~p laps\n", [self(), Laps]),
 1185:     Collector ! {gone, self()};
 1186: 
 1187: loop_runner_cont(Collector, Fun, N, Laps) ->
 1188:     Fun(),
 1189:     receive
 1190:         {abort, Collector} ->
 1191:             io:format("loop_runner ~p aborted after ~p of ~p laps\n", [self(), N+1, Laps]),
 1192:             Collector ! {gone, self()}
 1193:     after 0 ->
 1194:               loop_runner_cont(Collector, Fun, N+1, Laps)
 1195:     end.
 1196: 
 1197: 
 1198: f1(X) ->
 1199:     {X}.
 1200: 
 1201: f2(X, Y) ->
 1202:     {X, Y}.
 1203: 
 1204: f3(X,Y) ->
 1205:     ?MODULE:f2(X,Y),
 1206:     ok.
 1207: 
 1208: fn(X) ->
 1209:     [X].
 1210: fn(X, Y) ->
 1211:     [X, Y].
 1212: fn(X, Y, Z) ->
 1213:     [X, Y, Z].
 1214: 
 1215: fbinmatch(<<Int, Rest/binary>>, Acc) ->
 1216:     fbinmatch(Rest, [?MODULE:f1(Int) | Acc]);
 1217: fbinmatch(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
 1218: 
 1219: id(X) ->
 1220:     X.
 1221: 
 1222: -file("test4.erl", 1).
 1223: f3_test4(X,Y) ->
 1224:     ?MODULE:f2_test4(X,Y), % Line 3 - This line number should remain stable
 1225:     ok.
 1226: 
 1227: f2_test4(X, _) ->
 1228:     ?MODULE:f1_test4(X).
 1229: 
 1230: f1_test4(X) ->
 1231:     {X}.
 1232: 
 1233: -file("test5.erl", 1).
 1234: f3_test5(X,Y) ->
 1235:     f2_test5(X,Y), % Line 3 - This line number should remain stable
 1236:     ok.
 1237: 
 1238: f2_test5(X, _) ->
 1239:     f1_test5(X).
 1240: 
 1241: f1_test5(X) ->
 1242:     {X}.
